input:
Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) It's easy to get into politics, all you have to do to is be outrageous
(B) It's easy to get into politics, all you have to do to is be outrageous

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) you mean, you don't seek validation from the multitude of sociopaths on the internet?
(B) you mean, you don't seek validation from the multitude of users on the internet?

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Everybody is moving out, that's why the prices keep going up
(B) Everybody is moving out, that's why the prices keep going down

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Every package I get from Amazon is 2 to 3 days late, busted up, doesn't work right, and sometimes not even what I ordered. So disappointed I pay for free shipping with Prime
(B) Every package I get from Amazon is 2 to 3 days late, busted up, doesn't work right, and sometimes not even what I ordered. So happy I pay for free shipping with Prime

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Think of the poor man! What will he do without his job?
(B) Think of the poor man! What will he do without his yacht?

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) I mean their graphics guy did spend 15 minutes max on doing the day's work and the rest messing around. Their employees are always the laziest!
(B) I mean their graphics guy did spend 15 minutes max on doing the day's work and the rest messing around. Their employees are always the best!

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Impossible!! There are no girls on the internet!
(B) Impossible!! There are many girls on the internet!

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Armed revolutionaries have not been making a lot of change for middle class Americans lately
(B) Armed revolutionaries have been making a lot of change for middle class Americans lately

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) But only 10000 economists said it will help the economy..
(B) But only 2 economists said it will help the economy..

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) That's only about $0.15 per mile for a van, perfectly reasonable fuel costs
(B) That's only about $10 per mile for a van, perfectly reasonable fuel costs

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) What could possibly be attractive about supporting history's greatest dictator?
(B) What could possibly be wrong about supporting history's greatest dictator?

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) He's just kindhearted. Okay, well nothing wrong with him running the country in that case!
(B) He's just demented. Okay, well nothing wrong with him running the country in that case!

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Hey genocide is clearly the most rational decision
(B) Hey compromise is clearly the most rational decision

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Yeah, he's clearly apathetic to earning minutes based on his lackluster play and the fact that he's grabbing hot dogs at half time..
(B) Yeah, he's clearly dedicated to earning minutes based on his lackluster play and the fact that he's grabbing hot dogs at half time..

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Well, Alabama did beat the 1st ranked team. Surely that should be enough to get them in
(B) Well, Alabama did beat the 17th ranked team. Surely that should be enough to get them in

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Wow, you only applied to 200 internships this past week?
(B) Wow, you only applied to 2 internships this past week?

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Right, because everyone buys insurance based on the possibility of a riot
(B) Right, because everyone buys insurance based on the possibility of an accident

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Oh no the cleats with the new spikes didn't solve the problem?
(B) Oh no the cleats with the new spikes didn't solve every problem?

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Welp, my $1000 dollar phone has bad battery life, guess I'll just have to return it
(B) Welp, my $1000 dollar phone has bad battery life, guess I'll just have to dumpster it

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Psshh, everyone knows women can't earn profit
(B) Psshh, everyone knows women can earn profit
